1041330.name: Tiger Fighter 1931 Tora!
1041330.description:
The game's system is somewhere between air combat and naval warfare. It's a lot like the old game I played as a kid, and we control fighters to destroy the enemy's fleet. We crossed the line of fire and shot down one enemy after another，fighter、striker、bomber、gunship、battleship and airship.

1.up to 2 big kinds of enemy air and sea ;
2.up to 6 kinds of enemy air army;
3.up to 3 kinds of enemy navy;
4.up to 20 missions.
1041330.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
